portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: ドコにいくンだい！ 修行に集中しな！
portrait_l.ascii: Where do you think you're going!? Focus on your training!

sjis.partner: もいないし タタラを使うのはやめようかな

ascii.partner: isn't here. I shouldn't use the forge.

portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: アンタたちは現実と 戦わなきゃいけないんだよ！ 生活かかってンだから！
portrait_l.ascii: You guys have to get it together! Our lives is at stake!

portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: ２人でミューノを呼んできな
portrait_l.ascii: You two, go wake up Murno.
